$unit?=m{$unitstr=min}{} $unit?=h{$unitstr=hora}{} $unit?=d{$unitstr=día}{} $unit?=w{$unitstr=semana}{} $unit?=M{$unitstr=mes}{} $unitstr?=mes{$s=es}{$s=s} $time?=1{}{$unitstr=$unitstr$s} $encurl=%encode[url]
